text: Donda 2 is an unfinished album from Kanye West (who goes by Ye). A listening party was held on February 22, 2022 with some of the songs being later released on Kanye West Stem Player. The producer Digital Nas livestreamed his progress reworking Donda 2 throughout April 2025, and West released the updated album on streaming services on April 29 under the name "DONDA" Category:Kanye West albums
title: Donda 2
